definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: [[קדם]] (√ of foll.; be before, in front, cf. As. ḳudmu front, former time; Ar. qadama precede (so Eth. qadama:), IV, v. be bold and foremost in attack ([[קָדַם]]

definitions.title: 1 a
definitions.body: ); Sab.[[קדם]] begin Hom:Chreat, 126, march forth, advance, CIS:iv, No 79, 1. 9 Sab Denkm:No. 9, 1.2.4.6.7.8.9, ([[הו]])[[קדמ]] front CIS:iv, No. 276, 1.2; Ph.[[כקדם]] as formerly (?); OAram.[[קדם]] before, so Palm. Nab.; BAram. Targum [[קֳדָם]] before; Syr.qdam precede; NH [[קָדַם]] be in front).
